snippet.title: Hello Neighbor 2 - Pre-Orders NOW & Play Beta | Pre-Order Trailer | PC, PlayStation, Xbox
snippet.description:
Hello Neighbor 2 pre-orders are NOW LIVE! 
Get immediate access to the exclusive Beta with your Standard or Deluxe Edition pre-order on Xbox, PlayStation, EGS, & Steam!

Book your ticket to Raven Brooks now!
🎟️https://tblink.co/HelloNeighbor2|

Edition Info:
Standard edition: Get immediate Beta access on Pre-Order completion + full game on launch.
Deluxe Edtion: immediate Beta access on Pre-Order completion, full game on launch, + 5 days of Early Access & 3 brand new DLC on full game launch!

Join the Neighborhood: http://discord.gg/neighborgames 

Be in the Know at www.helloneighbor2.com

Follow us on social media:
Twitter: https://twitter.com/NeighborGamesHQ
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/NeighborGamesHQ
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/NeighborGamesHQ 
Tiktok: https://www.tiktok.com/@tinybuild?lang=en 

#HelloNeighbor2 #HelloNeighbor #tinyBuildGames #PlayStation #Steam #Xbox
